item.title: How to Promote Yourself in Today’s Data Science Job Market
item.description: Tomorrow, I will be giving a talk on "How to Promote Yourself in Today's Data Science Job Market" at @oc_rug's 2nd #DataScience #hackathon. All of them are based on my personal experience of only looking for jobs in one city (Seattle) in the past year. https://t.co/UMj773UYLn pic.twitter.com/HdXhMe0o4k — Zhi Yang, PhD (@zhiiiyang) November 9, 2019

item.title: How R Markdown helped me thrive in scientific research and advance my career development?
R you ready to see awesome R Markdown?
item.description: Nice turnout for the kickstart of the #uscrbootcamp with @malco_barrett, @brookemariebell, and @zhiiiyang spearheading day 1 of track 1! #rstats pic.twitter.com/4qPcsKzxW6 — George G. Vega Yon (@gvegayon) August 19, 2019
